版本/,波诺马里的设计为用户提供了访问，了解和体验的丰富和美丽的正教圣传。该程序是目前发展阶段。/,在波诺马里项目中，我们认为礼典信息应当免费——也就是说不收费也不受版权的制约。上帝并没有保留圣经的版权，圣约安也没有保留《八音集》的版权。 您可以从本站获得任何东西并用于任何用途，只要您信任我们。如果您要发布您自己对本站信息的修改成果，您需要在许可的体系下进行。/,版权所有/,/,为感谢：中文版由正教会中华诸圣会提供。
主显跳转/,路喀跳转/,福音经课/,选择所需福音经课。

PHRASE.Value: YY年MMDD日WW
PHRASE.Comment: This will 显示 a type similar to 1999年十月4日星期一. The permissible codes are WW for Weekname, DD for the day number, MM for the month, YY for the year. Any additonal formatting can be included such as comma after any number.

PHRASE.Comment: This is the 字体 to be used for 显示 all the relevant information on screen for the Main interface. A blank entry of "" will 选择 the default 字体.
The size of the 字体 for the Main interface, since some 语言s need a larger 字体 size to be legible. A blank entry will give the default value of 12.

This is the 字体 to be used for 显示 information in the Liturgical aspect. At times, the 字体 of the Liturgics will be different from that of the main Screen (for example, Russian interface; Church Slavonic Liturgics).
The size of the 字体 for the Liturgics aspect (see FontFaceL) for explanation, since some 语言s need a larger 字体 size to be legible. A blank entry will give the default value of 12.
This is the mark to separate the different commemorations that are 显示.
This is the mark to separate the readings.
This is for everytime that a colon is required.

This is the 2 letter ISO code for the given 语言. This will also determine component orientation, for example left-to-right, right-to-left (Hebrew, Arabic, Farsi), top-right-to-bottom-left (Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese), and top-left-to-bottom-right (Traditional Mongolian).
This is the 2 letter ISO code for the given country. This may be required later on for some things.

This is the Unicode location for the starting point of the numbers. Changing it to a different starting point will allow any non-Western decimal system to be used. For 'Arabic' numerals (0,1,2,3,4,5...) the starting point is 0!
This allows ideographic numerals to be 显示 instead of the normal decimal based values, that is, 145 will be 显示 as for example, CXLV. 1 = yes!

PHRASE.Value: HH时MM分
PHRASE.Comment: This gives the format for the time. The 24-hour clock will be used.

PHRASE.Value: 生平/,差遣颂/,特别旋律：/,集祷颂/,第TT调式/,; /,Information 关于 this commemoration 丢失.
PHRASE.Comment: A space (ifrequired) should be placed before and after the 2nd entry.

PHRASE.Value: 上一页圣像/,下一页圣像/,圣像文件找不到。

PHRASE.Note: This is how a colon is to appear in the given texts.

PHRASE.Value: （For %getN(^CC,Short)）
PHRASE.Comments: %getN is a generalised grammar engine that will return the appropriate grammatical form. The format is Noun (in this case to be specified so ^CC) and the desired case (as defined in the commemoration files)

PHRASE.Value: Name not found
PHRASE.Comments: Failure to find any name for a given commemoration!

PHRASE.Value: 🕃^NF
🕃^NF
🕂^NF
🕁^NF
🕀^NF

PHRASE.Note: This allows the time value to be displayed with at least the given number of digits. Must be equal to or greater than 1
This allows the time value to be displayed with at least the given number of digits. Must be equal to or greater than 1

This determine the order in which the Month Year selection boxes in the Main display for the calendar are displayed. MM implies that the month will come first, while YY implies that the year will do so.

There is no need to include the current language and its path up, as it will be searched by default. Similarly, only the lowest desired searachable path should be considered, as the programme will by default search up the tree from the given point.

PHRASE.Value: （创世^YYAM年）
PHRASE.Note: This displays the anno mundi year in brackets in the calendar, only for the Julian date
This determines whether or not the Anno Mundi value will be displayed. 1 = Yes, 0 = No.
This determines whether the AM value comes before (B) the rest of the date or after (A) it
This is a relative path to the default icon desired for the case where there is no icons available.
